events.name: PyData Meetup - September 2016 - TensorFlow Tutorial
events.description: Agenda  • 6:45pm - 7:00pm Networking • 7:00pm - 7:50pm Presentation: Machine Learning with TensorFlow and Python Speaker: Karthik Muthuswamy Synopsis: Over the past few years, machine learning has gained widespread popularity in a number of disciplines with applications ranging from drug design to keeping cats off the lawn, stock market trends to descriptions of the visual world. Machine learning has changed the way we interact and use real-world data to provide insights that are otherwise not directly available for us to leverage. In this talk, we will discuss how we could design our own machine learning system with Google's TensorFlow and take a look at how to perform prediction, classify images and text using the TensorFlow API.  Bio: Karthik graduated from NTU Singapore with a PhD, where his topic of research was computer vision for multimedia broadcast and consumption. Some of his research interests include end-to-end deep learning for object detection & recognition and 3D vision. Python is his go-to language for any task related to vision and machine learning for its ease of prototyping and speed. Lucky draw from our sponsors at O'Reilly. Updates • New ebooks/videos from O'Reilly! Only for members attending the session! Join us on Facebook and Twitter  https://www.facebook.com/groups/pydatasg/ https://www.twitter.com/pydatasg  Sponsors     Group Sponsor
events.location: Skyscanner, 39 Robinson Road, #09-01 Robinson Point, Singapore 068911

events.name: Getting started with Cross Stitch by DMC Asia Pacific
events.description:
Getting started with Cross Stitch by DMC Asia Pacific
Programme Details
Since 1746, generations of stitchers have selected DMC needlework threads to create cherished heirlooms. DMC Mouline Stranded Cotton, which is also known as the king of threads, is the most widely used threads by millions of stitches around the world. 

This 1-hour session will talk how DMC Mouliné Stranded Cotton has become one of the most popular thread and how cross stitch has evolved and modernise with technology today. 

The talk will also include a Custom by me! demonstration.

Register Here
https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/creative-crew-talks-sep-meeting-2016-tickets-18362384386
events.location: Toa Payoh Public Library, 6 Toa Payoh Central, Singapore 319191
